Text: Every mass shooting has one thing in common that is overlooked. They were all on prescription drugs. Mainly anti-depressants. So people with guns that are also on drugs do stupid things but this still doesnt explain why was the Newtown relief website up 3 days before the shooting took place.
Went up 3 days before....OOOOHHHHOOOOHHHOOO...another conspiracy eegit living in the dark netherworlds of insanity....YYYYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!
